Title: The EAT-'Lancet' commission outlines a fairer global diet for feeding the planet sustainably
Subhead: A study published on Friday in 'The Lancet' finds that food systems are a major driver of environmental degradation, rising chronic disease and growing inequality. The report calls for a shift toward less meat-heavy diets and a more equitable distribution of value along the food chain.
